tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_management_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  market_event VARCHAR(255),
  action_taken VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE MarketEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RiskActions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES MarketEvents(event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_id INT,
    risk_level VARCHAR(25),
    assessment_date TIMESTAMP,
    assessment_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES RiskActions(action_id)
)
